name: OpenSourceFacts
0:
”Alexa, open FOSS Facts”
”Alexa, start FOSS Facts”
”Alexa, begin FOSS Facts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: foss facts
des:
This skill is for all the Open Source enthusiasts. When invoked, this generates a random, yet rare facts related to FOSS.
Alternatively, this can be used to enhance the person's knowledge on open source, too.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
